text_block_list.text:
The day before Christmas, after training 
was over.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, what are your plans for
tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see! Then, I shall do you the honor of 
going out somewhere together with me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, then, farewell―!

I then managed to get the details of the 
meeting, and the next day…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oya! 
You're quite early, Trainer.
choice_data_list:
I thought Bakushin O would get here with her usual 
speed.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That is true! 
I'm an honors student, after all!
choice_data_list: But, I thought you said an hour ago was early.

text_block_list.text:
Our engagement is at eleven. 
And it's only 10:00 now.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's good to be fast―rather, early! 
So, with all haste, let's get to it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, I can understand your 
excitement, but please do settle down.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Because I've learned how to spend 
Christmas in a proper and exemplary way!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Precisely! That's what the magazine my 
classmate was reading said!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If it's said to be an exemplary way to
spend one's time, then there's no choice
but to put it into practice!

There was a part of me that was a little
concerned when I heard it was from a
magazine her classmates were looking at,
but I decided to just go along with it
without saying anything.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
First things first, lunch! 
The place should be around here…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Holdupholdup, looks like it's right over
there! That brick building is an Italian
restaurant!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It certainly has an Italian look to it!
And with so few people around, it's like
a nice little secret hideaway!
choice_data_list: Maybe it's because it's still early?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It'll be just fine! 
It's an early-speedy lunch!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's gooo―!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Mmm～… ♪ 
That was deeelicious!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And the desserts were so sweet, it was
almost like a secret spell was cast
on them!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But, sure enough, I suppose I just
couldn't hide my class president aura,
can I?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I had no idea that they would serve it
in a heart-shaped bowl… I could feel the
waitress's unwavering trust in me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now then, onto the shopping! 
Let me see here, I think I recall the 
magazine said that general store is the 
place to go!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm, there's nothing in particular
that I want right now. But if it's the
exemplary place to be, let's give it
a shot.

After that, we window-shopped at a 
general store that sold Christmas 
ornaments, and then watched a lights 
display…

It turned into a full day out with
Sakura Bakushin O.
Then, after we'd finished dinner…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, now that was a very fun day! 
Wasn't it amazingly exemplary?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If we finish the final item on our
itinerary strong, it'll be a perfect
score! Let's see, I think the last one
is……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right! Let's hug it out under the
starry night sky!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
……Wait, hug!? 
Eeehh, why?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But it looked like it most certainly,
definitely, undeniably did say that!
Could I have overlooked something?!
choice_data_list: Wasn't today a plan for a date, though?

text_block_list.text:
When I look back the day, I feel like
I went on your typical, run-of-the-mill
date plan, so to speak.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A date?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So, you're saying that my Trainer and I
have been on a date this whole time?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Chowaaaahh――!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aah! Date! Nowaynowaynoway, no way!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
To think that the class president
herself would take part in impure
relations!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O, today's 
disappointment!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
What do I dooo!? I can't face my fellow
classmates like this!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaahhh, am I going to be dragged into 
school for punishment tomorrow!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As punishment for betraying everyone's
trust, will I forever be branded as a
good- for-nothing class president―!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer, what do I dooo～!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eh!
choice_data_list: I didn't see any students getting carried away!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohhh～!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's right! 
None whatsoever!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir!

And so, that was how I spent a wholesome 
Christmas with Sakura Bakushin O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Well, I suppose it's alright!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Because if it's with your Trainer, it's
not like it's an impure relationship.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In fact, I'd say it's a very pure
affair!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
However, hugging is a no-go for the
class president, so I'll give you
something special instead!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed! 
It's a notebook!

Sakura Bakushin O gave me a personal 
organizer to help me keep track of my 
management schedule.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I thought you might need it before
the new year! Since I'm the impossibly
intelligent and thoughtful class
president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I've even filled in the schedule for
you! Here are my future race plans!

I flipped through the pages and saw G1,
G1, G1…… There was a chock-full schedule
of races.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
For now I'm thinking we'll enter every
race, but I'll book an appointment to
hash it out with you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Canceling appointments is a Miracle-no-
go! Let's Bakushin together next year,
too!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, you're very welcome!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
…Aaaahhh―!? 
It's already so late!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class presdient, I absolutely cannot 
break the curfew!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Let's Bakushin, Trainer! I'll lead you
along this time, just for you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now, give me your hand!

…And thus, the noisy yet joyful 
Christmas night went on.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's・Bakushiiiin!
